dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5585 IH: To extend the authorization for the Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Keating introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To extend the authorization for the Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission.

section.header: Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission
section.text: Effective September 26, 2018, section 8(a) of Public Law 87–126 (16 U.S.C. 459b–7(a)) is amended in the second sentence by striking 2018 and inserting 2028.
